tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE simulations (
    simulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    simulation_date DATE,
    simulated_by VARCHAR(100)
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES models(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE animation_metadata (
    animation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    animation_name VARCHAR(50),
    duration_seconds FLOAT,
    model_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES 3d_model_coordinates(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_simulation_history (
    simulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    simulation_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    model_id INT,
    animation_id INT,
    texture_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES 3d_model_coordinates(model_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (animation_id) REFERENCES animation_metadata(animation_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (texture_id) REFERENCES texture_mapping(texture_id)
);
